description: The guy with grey hair is alone, thinking.
text: Guy with grey hair: (thinking) AI... generative... product...

description: The guy with grey hair is running to the guy with blond hair.
text:
Guy with grey hair: I found it! Let's create a product with Generative AI!
Guy with blond hair: Amazing let's do it!

description: The two guys are sitting at the office, in front of their computers.
text:
Guy with grey hair: So what should we create?
Guy with blond hair: We could create a marketing assistant.

description: The two guys are presenting their product to a group of people.
text:
Guy with grey hair: Here is our new Generative AI product!
Guy with blond hair: It can help businesses with their marketing campaigns.

description: The two guys are celebrating their success.
text:
Guy with grey hair: We did it!
Guy with blond hair: Our product is a success!
